install.name: Spotlight
install.author: HUBzero
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module randomly displays featured items.

param.name: spotone
param.label: Spot 1 Content
param.description: Select content type for the first featured item.

param.name: spottwo
param.label: Spot 2 Content
param.description: Select content type for the second featured item.

param.name: spotthree
param.label: Spot 3 Content
param.description: Select content type for the third featured item.

param.name: spotfour
param.label: Spot 4 Content
param.description: Select content type for the fourth featured item.

param.name: spotfive
param.label: Spot 5 Content
param.description: Select content type for the fifth featured item.

param.name: spotsix
param.label: Spot 6 Content
param.description: Select content type for the sixth featured item.

param.name: spotseven
param.label: Spot 7 Content
param.description: Select content type for the seventh featured item.

param.name: numspots
param.label: Number of Spots
param.description: How many features to display

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: txt_length
param.label: Text Length
param.description: Length of the bio text to show

param.name: minranking
param.label: Minimum Ranking
param.description: A minimum ranking for resources that can be selected

param.name: tag
param.label: Tag
param.description: A tag to be the pool that resources entries are drawn from

param.name: show
param.label: Select from
param.description: Select random entries from either all members or contributors only

param.name: min_contributions
param.label: Min. # Contributions
param.description: The minimum number of contributions a profile must have to be selected

param.name: itunes_tag
param.label: iTunes Tag
param.description: A tag to be the pool that iTunes content entries are drawn from

param.name: default_itunespic
param.label: Default iTunes Picture
param.description: URL to default picture for featured iTunes content

param.name: topics_tag
param.label: Topics Tag
param.description: A tag to be the pool that Topics entries are drawn from

param.name: default_topicpic
param.label: Default Topics Picture
param.description: URL to default picture for featured topics

param.name: default_questionpic
param.label: Default Question Picture
param.description: URL to default picture for featured question

param.name: default_blogpic
param.label: Default Blog Picture
param.description: URL to default picture for featured blog

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is re-cached
